RoyalTitleDef.label: commfriend
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has shown a willingness to work with the Commerce Branch.

RoyalTitleDef.label: obverse (1)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Commerce Branch, and as such has limited access to its economic tools.

RoyalTitleDef.label: exchanger (2)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Commerce Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional lesser favors.

RoyalTitleDef.label: barterer (3)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Commerce Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional favors, such as making investments or bribes.

RoyalTitleDef.label: trader (4)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Commerce Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional favors, such as making investments, offering bribes, or obtaining resources.

RoyalTitleDef.label: investor (5)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Commerce Branch, and may prevail upon it for favors, such as making investments, offering bribes, or obtaining resources.

RoyalTitleDef.label: financier (6)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Commerce Branch, and may prevail upon it for many favors, such as making investments, offering bribes to other factions, or obtaining resources.

RoyalTitleDef.label: marketeer (7)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the high regard of the Commerce Branch, and may prevail upon it for many favors, such as making investments, offering bribes en masse, obtaining resources, or signaling traders.

RoyalTitleDef.label: bankroller (8)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the high regard of the Commerce Branch, and may prevail upon it for all manner of economic favors.

RoyalTitleDef.label: paxfriend
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has shown a willingness to work with the Pax Branch.

RoyalTitleDef.label: buckler (1)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Pax Branch, and may prevail upon it for the occasional lesser favor, such as deploying automated defense turrets or soliciting mortar shells.

RoyalTitleDef.label: targe (2)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Pax Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional lesser favors, such as deploying automated defense turrets or soliciting combat resources.

RoyalTitleDef.label: adarga (3)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Pax Branch, and may prevail upon it for various occasional lesser favors, such as deploying automated defense turrets or soliciting combat resources.

RoyalTitleDef.label: aspis (4)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Pax Branch, and may prevail upon it for various occasional favors, such as deploying automated defense turrets, deploying shields, or soliciting combat resources.

RoyalTitleDef.label: isihlangu (5)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Pax Branch, and may prevail upon it for various favors, such as deploying automated defenses, soliciting combat resources, or requisitioning the use of climate-affecting weapons.

RoyalTitleDef.label: scutum (6)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Pax Branch, and may prevail upon it for many favors, such as deploying automated defenses, soliciting combat resources, or requisitioning the use of climate-affecting weapons.

RoyalTitleDef.label: pavise (7)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the high regard of the Pax Branch, and may prevail upon it for many favors, such as deploying automated defenses, soliciting dangerously potent combat resources, requisitioning the use of climate-affecting weapons, or even calling down mech clusters.

RoyalTitleDef.label: fortress (8)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the high regard of the Pax Branch, and may prevail upon it for a vast breadth of favors.

RoyalTitleDef.label: roverfriend
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has shown a willingness to work with the Rover Branch.

RoyalTitleDef.label: roamling (1)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Rover Branch, and may prevail upon it for the occasional lesser favor.

RoyalTitleDef.label: itinerant (2)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Rover Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional lesser favors.

RoyalTitleDef.label: traveler (3)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Rover Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional favors, such as locating sites of interest or calling transportation.

RoyalTitleDef.label: wayfarer (4)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Rover Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional favors, such as locating sites of interest or calling transportation.

RoyalTitleDef.label: voyager (5)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Rover Branch, and may prevail upon it for favors, such as locating sites of interest or calling transportation.

RoyalTitleDef.label: globetrotter (6)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Rover Branch, and may prevail upon it for many favors, such as locating multiple or unusual sites.

RoyalTitleDef.label: surveyor (7)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the high regard of the Rover Branch, and may prevail upon it for many favors, such as locating multiple unusual sites.

RoyalTitleDef.label: cartographer (8)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the high regard of the Rover Branch, and may prevail upon it for a vast breadth of favors, such as locating multiple unusual sites.

RoyalTitleDef.label: archivefriend
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has shown a willingness to work with the Archive Branch.

RoyalTitleDef.label: recordkeeper (1)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Archive Branch, and may prevail upon it for the occasional lesser favor, such as obtaining dossiers of information or improving items.

RoyalTitleDef.label: archivist (2)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Archive Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional lesser favors, such as obtaining dossiers of information, improving items, or scanning the terrain.

RoyalTitleDef.label: preservationist (3)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Archive Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional lesser favors, such as obtaining unique kinds of ideoligious knowledge, improving items, or scanning the terrain.

RoyalTitleDef.label: anthropologist (4)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Archive Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional favors, such as obtaining valuable forms of information, improving and restoring items, or scanning the terrain.

RoyalTitleDef.label: docent (5)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Archive Branch, and may prevail upon it for favors, such as obtaining valuable forms of information, improving and restoring items, or scanning the terrain.

RoyalTitleDef.label: reliquarian (6)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Archive Branch, and may prevail upon it for many favors, such as obtaining valuable forms of information, improving and restoring items, or scanning the terrain.

RoyalTitleDef.label: antiquarian (7)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the high regard of the Archive Branch, and may prevail upon it for many favors, such as obtaining exotic items and artifacts, obtaining valuable forms of information, improving and restoring items, or scanning the terrain.

RoyalTitleDef.label: akashic (8)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the high regard of the Archive Branch, and may prevail upon it for all manner of favors pertaining to knowledge and craftsmanship.

RoyalTitleDef.label: ecofriend
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has shown a willingness to work with the Ecosphere Branch.

RoyalTitleDef.label: tender (1)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Ecosphere Branch, and may prevail upon it for the occasional lesser favor, such as the delivery of small animals or cheap medical equipment.

RoyalTitleDef.label: gardener (2)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Ecosphere Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional lesser favors, such as the delivery of animals or direct medical aid.

RoyalTitleDef.label: naturalist (3)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Ecosphere Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional favors, such as the delivery of animals, medical technology, or direct medical aid.

RoyalTitleDef.label: environmentalist (4)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Ecosphere Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional favors, such as the delivery of animals, medical aid, genetic manipulation, terraforming, or climate adjustment.

RoyalTitleDef.label: terraformer (5)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Ecosphere Branch, and may prevail upon it for favors, such as the delivery of animals, medical aid, genetic manipulation, terraforming, or climate adjustment.

RoyalTitleDef.label: worldshaper (6)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Ecosphere Branch, and may prevail upon it for many favors, such as the delivery of animals, medical aid, genetic manipulation, terraforming, or climate adjustment.

RoyalTitleDef.label: edenite (7)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the high regard of the Ecosphere Branch, and may prevail upon it for many advanced favors, such as the delivery of animals, medical aid, genetic manipulation, terraforming, or climate adjustment.

RoyalTitleDef.label: gaean (8)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the high regard of the Ecosphere Branch, and may prevail upon it for all manner of favors pertaining to medicine, health, flora, fauna, and the environment.

RoyalTitleDef.label: occultfriend
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has shown a willingness to work with the Occult Branch.

RoyalTitleDef.label: aware (1)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Occult Branch, and may prevail upon it for the occasional lesser favor, such as _.

RoyalTitleDef.label: neophyte (2)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Occult Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional lesser favors, such as _.

RoyalTitleDef.label: dabbler (3)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the trust of the Occult Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional favors, such as _.

RoyalTitleDef.label: tamperer (4)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Occult Branch, and may prevail upon it for occasional favors, such as _.

RoyalTitleDef.label: practitioner (5)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Occult Branch, and may prevail upon it for favors, such as _.

RoyalTitleDef.label: convoker (6)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the esteem of the Occult Branch, and may prevail upon it for many favors, such as _.

RoyalTitleDef.label: thaumaturge (7)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the high regard of the Occult Branch, and may prevail upon it for many favors, such as _.

RoyalTitleDef.label: revelantor (8)
RoyalTitleDef.description: This individual has the high regard of the Occult Branch, and may prevail upon it for all manner of favors pertaining to psychic phenomena and related technology.
